mapper.sql: t.id id, t.gwid gwid, t.gdzj gdzj, t.gwyl gwyl, t.shgd shgd, t.ll ll, t.jsgzj jsgzj, t.csgzj csgzj, t.jscd jscd, t.jgid jgid, t.jlzt jlzt, t.cszt cszt, t.sjbb sjbb, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.ywxtbsid ywxtbsid, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.bz bz, t.tbjdh tbjdh, TO_CHAR(t.tbsjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') tbsjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, TO_CHAR(t.reserve3,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve3, t.pkid pkid, TO_CHAR(t.vercol,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') vercol
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM SY_XFSHSXXX t WHERE 1=1 AND jlzt = 1

SELECT
FROM SY_XFSHSXXX t WHERE t.jlzt = 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SY_XFSHSXXX(id,gwid,gdzj,gwyl,shgd,ll,jsgzj,csgzj,jscd,jgid,jlzt,cszt,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,sjc,bz,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,pkid,vercol) VALUES(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gdzj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gwyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{shgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jsgzj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{csgzj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=DATE},#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{vercol,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE SY_XFSHSXXX t SET t.jlzt = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND t.ID = #{value}

INSERT INTO SY_XFSHSXXX(id,gwid,gdzj,gwyl,shgd,ll,jsgzj,csgzj,jscd,jgid,jlzt,cszt,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,sjc,bz,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,pkid,vercol) VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} id,#{item.gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gwid,#{item.gdzj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gdzj,#{item.gwyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gwyl,#{item.shgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE} shgd,#{item.ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ll,#{item.jsgzj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jsgzj,#{item.csgzj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} csgzj,#{item.jscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jscd,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jlzt,#{item.cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cszt,#{item.sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sjbb,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywxtbsid,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} tbjdh,#{item.tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE} tbsjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=DATE} reserve3,#{item.vercol,jdbcType=DATE} vercol
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = VALUES(id), gwid = VALUES(gwid), gdzj = VALUES(gdzj), gwyl = VALUES(gwyl), shgd = VALUES(shgd), ll = VALUES(ll), jsgzj = VALUES(jsgzj), csgzj = VALUES(csgzj), jscd = VALUES(jscd), jgid = VALUES(jgid), jlzt = VALUES(jlzt), cszt = VALUES(cszt), sjbb = VALUES(sjbb), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), ywxtbsid = VALUES(ywxtbsid), sjc = VALUES(sjc), bz = VALUES(bz), tbjdh = VALUES(tbjdh), tbsjc = VALUES(tbsjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), pkid = VALUES(pkid), vercol = VALUES(vercol)

SELECT
FROM SY_XFSHSXXX t WHERE t.jlzt = 1
